humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that out of 12 examined lymph nodes, 2 were positive for metastatic carcinoma. This corresponds to the N1 stage, as per the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes). The report also mentions that the size of the largest metastasis is over 2 cm, but this does not affect the N stage in this context.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is pN1a, which is indicated in the report by '2/12' in part 2A, meaning 2 out of 12 lymph nodes were positive for metastatic carcinoma. The N stage is determined by the number of lymph nodes involved, regardless of substaging information.
